title: Pyro!
author: Pyro!
content: Hello everyone! My name is Artymus and i will be offering here my entire COIN and BANKNOTES collection for crypto! I am collecting coins for 20 years and collecting crypto for only 3 years! Now i understand that investing in real old coins is much safer!)))I invite every crypto enthusiast into my community here! Believe - investing in old coins and banknotes for crypto is great opportunity to save money!!! The collection consists from different times and areas: Greek, Roman, German, Russian, USA, Asian, African, European and many more. Prices will be from 30 to 6000 USDT (or at the current rate to BTC, ETH). Every lot will be with detailed description!

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: Pyro! on August 10, 2022, 01:39:27 PMi will be offering here my entire COIN and BANKNOTES collection for crypto!You might want to fill in the missing parts by following the format from "this thread" and also make sure to move this thread to the "Collectibles" board instead.- Move button is in the bottom left corner of the page.Quote from: Pyro! on August 10, 2022, 01:39:27 PMNow i understand that investing in real old coins is much safer!)))It still depends on a few things [e.g. what you're comparing them with, their condition, if they're graded or not and etc...]!Quote from: Pyro! on August 10, 2022, 01:39:27 PMI invite every crypto enthusiast into my community here!It looks like you forgot to include the link to your community.
